reminders.title: Submit expense report
reminders.description: Submit monthly expense report before end of day deadline

reminders.title: Review and sign contract
reminders.description: Review the vendor contract and sign if everything looks good

reminders.title: Renew software license
reminders.description: Renew Adobe Creative Cloud subscription before it expires

reminders.title: Send birthday card to Mom
reminders.description: Don't forget Mom's birthday is coming up - mail card today!

reminders.title: Water office plants
reminders.description: Weekly plant watering day - don't let them dry out!

reminders.title: Prepare presentation slides
reminders.description: Finish slides for Thursday's client meeting - at least 24 hours before

reminders.title: Backup important files
reminders.description: Weekly reminder to backup all important project files to cloud storage

reminders.title: Order office supplies
reminders.description: Restock printer paper, pens, and sticky notes before we run out

reminders.title: Follow up with recruiter
reminders.description: Send follow-up email to recruiter about interview feedback

reminders.title: Pay credit card bill
reminders.description: Credit card payment is due - pay before late fees apply

reminders.title: Take out trash bins
reminders.description: Trash pickup is Thursday morning - take bins to curb Wednesday night

reminders.title: RSVP to company holiday party
reminders.description: Deadline to RSVP for the December holiday party is next week

reminders.title: Update emergency contacts
reminders.description: Update emergency contact information in HR system
